CoonHunter:

alright that method didnt work either. I know this is possible, just wtf is wrong with it. Is there an easier way to write in a minigame and a funpk area than editing the YouDied void?

The one I provided works correctly, just like I said, stop calling it multiple times and you won’t get the repeat messages (you’re basically making the character die 2-3 times per death).

item.title: Public void youdied() { (glitches)
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

for (int r : playerItems) { if (r == -1) { continue; } ItemHandler.addItem(r - 1, absX, absY, i, KillerId, false); deleteItem(r - 1, getItemSlot(r - 1), i); i++; } removeAllItems(); teleportToX = 3094; teleportToY = 3478; sendMessage("Oh dear, you GOT OWNED"); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
Should be

for (int r : playerItems) { if (r == -1) { continue; } ItemHandler.addItem(r - 1, absX, absY, i, KillerId, false); deleteItem(r - 1, getItemSlot(r - 1), i); i++; } else { removeAllItems(); teleportToX = 3094; teleportToY = 3478; sendMessage("Oh dear, you GOT OWNED"); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic

item.title: Public void youdied() { (glitches)
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

public void youdied() { if (pkmini()) { teleportToX = 2546; teleportToY = 3617; sendMessage("Oh dear, you GOT OWNED. Youved been teleport to the lobby."); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; return; } if (funpk()) { teleportToX = 3094; teleportToY = 3478; sendMessage("Oh dear, you GOT OWNED. Didnt loose your stuff tho :D"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; return; } int i = 0; for (int r : playerItems) { if (r == -1) { continue; } ItemHandler.addItem(r - 1, absX, absY, i, KillerId, false); deleteItem(r - 1, getItemSlot(r - 1), i); i++; } i = 0; for (int r : playerEquipment) { if (r == -1) { continue; } remove(r, i); i++; } i = 0; for (int r : playerItems) { if (r == -1) { continue; } ItemHandler.addItem(r - 1, absX, absY, i, KillerId, false); deleteItem(r - 1, getItemSlot(r - 1), i); i++; } removeAllItems(); teleportToX = 3094; teleportToY = 3478; sendMessage("Oh dear, you GOT OWNED"); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Should work.

Also, to stop the multiple messages, etc., stop calling it multiple times.

Read full topic

item.title: Public void youdied() { (glitches)
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

try it as this? I didnt spend much time on it so if you get 100 errors remember for every { there is a }

    public void youdied() {
	if (pkmini()) {
        teleportToX = 2546;
        teleportToY = 3617;
        sendMessage("Oh dear, you GOT OWNED. Youved been teleport to the lobby.");
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		}
	if (funpk()) {
        teleportToX = 3094;
        teleportToY = 3478;
        sendMessage("Oh dear, you GOT OWNED. Didnt loose your stuff tho :D");
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		}
	} else if (!funpk() && (!pkmini())) {
        for (int r = 0; r < playerEquipment.length; r++) {
            try {
                int item = playerEquipment[r];

                if ((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
                    remove(item, r);
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment");
            }
        }
        for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {
            try {
                if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {
                    // createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1);
                    ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr] - 1, absX, absY,
                            playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false);
                    // createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]);
                    deleteItem(playerItems[rr] - 1,
                            getItemSlot(playerItems[rr] - 1), playerItemsN[rr]); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {}
        }
        removeAllItems();
        for (int r = 0; r < playerEquipment.length; r++) {
            try {
                int item = playerEquipment[r];

                if ((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
                    remove(item, r);
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment");
            }
        }
        for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {
            try {
                if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {
                    // createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1);
                    ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr] - 1, absX, absY,
                            playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false);
                    // createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]);
                    deleteItem(playerItems[rr] - 1,
                            getItemSlot(playerItems[rr] - 1), playerItemsN[rr]); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {}
        }
        removeAllItems();
        teleportToX = 3094;
        teleportToY = 3478;
        // pEmote = 15;
        // pWalk = 13;
        sendMessage("Oh dear, you GOT OWNED");
        hitDiff = 0;	
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
    }

Read full topic

item.title: Public void youdied() { (glitches)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Alright, i edited this method to add a funpk minigame and a regular funpk. The glitches i have with it are, it sends message 2-3 times. For pkmini it teleports u home (where funpk teleports u). I need it to only read that portion. I believe i edited it correctly but i am not completely sure. Any way to make it not send the message multiple times and also the pkmini to teleport u back where i have it programmed?

    public void youdied() {
	if (pkmini()) {
        teleportToX = 2546;
        teleportToY = 3617;
        sendMessage("Oh dear, you GOT OWNED. Youved been teleport to the lobby.");
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	} else if (funpk()) {
        teleportToX = 3094;
        teleportToY = 3478;
        sendMessage("Oh dear, you GOT OWNED. Didnt loose your stuff tho :D");
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	} else if (!funpk() && (!pkmini())) {
        for (int r = 0; r < playerEquipment.length; r++) {
            try {
                int item = playerEquipment[r];

                if ((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
                    remove(item, r);
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment");
            }
        }
        for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {
            try {
                if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {
                    // createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1);
                    ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr] - 1, absX, absY,
                            playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false);
                    // createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]);
                    deleteItem(playerItems[rr] - 1,
                            getItemSlot(playerItems[rr] - 1), playerItemsN[rr]); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {}
        }
        removeAllItems();
        for (int r = 0; r < playerEquipment.length; r++) {
            try {
                int item = playerEquipment[r];

                if ((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
                    remove(item, r);
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment");
            }
        }
        for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {
            try {
                if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {
                    // createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1);
                    ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr] - 1, absX, absY,
                            playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false);
                    // createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]);
                    deleteItem(playerItems[rr] - 1,
                            getItemSlot(playerItems[rr] - 1), playerItemsN[rr]); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {}
        }
        removeAllItems();
        teleportToX = 3094;
        teleportToY = 3478;
        // pEmote = 15;
        // pWalk = 13;
        sendMessage("Oh dear, you GOT OWNED");
        hitDiff = 0;	
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
    }
